name: Phillips Machine Service. 2007a. The Freedom Car Family: FC12 Shuttle Coal Hauler
description:
DESCRIPTION
Data and specifications for FC12 shuttle car.  Used to determine average weight of single shuttle car.  Weight specifications highlighted.

FULL CITATION
Phillips Machine Service. 2007a. The Freedom Car Family: FC12 Shuttle Coal Hauler.  Phillips Machine Service.  http://www.phillipsmachine.com/pdf/FC12.PDF (accessed December 14, 2009).
